name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForPulmonaryHypertension
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Pulmonary Hypertension
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to pulmonary hypertension and is listed as a cardiovascular disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes primary and secondary pulmonary hypertension.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
